resources.string: There are two types of coupons: discount coupon and token coupon. For discount coupon, the percent of discount is specified on the coupon with the expiry date. You can use the coupon and get the corresponding discount when purchasing tokens on Buybuybee. For token coupon, the token value is specified on the coupon with the expiry date, approximately 2 dollars equals 10 tokens. You can use the coupon and get deduction of the total amount when purchasing tokens on Buybuybee.
Buybuybee provides many ways for users to acquire free coupons. Please check the details on the app.

The Buybuybee coupon is issued and approved by Buybuybee which can be used to deduct corresponding token amount or to get certain discount when purchasing tokens on Buybuybee. The coupon is redeemable only on the Buybuybee website and app.
A coupon can be used only on the condition that the value of the purchase of goods is equal to or greater than the denomination of the coupon.
A coupon is non-refundable and cannot be redeemed for tokens or cash in part or full.
A coupon is valid for a single transaction only. The coupon once used is treated as invalid and cannot be selected for any usage.

A coupon is valid for a limited time only and expires on the date specified on the coupon. The coupon once expired is treated as invalid and cannot be selected for any usage. Strictly no extension of the expiry date from the date of issue will be allowed.
